Agentic AI For Dummies®, Integrail Special Edition

This document excerpt details the copyright information and legal notices pertaining to the ‘Agentic AI For Dummies®, Integrail Special Edition’ publication. It’s a special edition produced by John Wiley & Sons, Inc., and explicitly prohibits unauthorized dissemination, distribution, or use of the materials. The copyright notice extends to 2025, emphasizing the intellectual property rights held by Wiley. It outlines the process for obtaining permission to reproduce the material, directing requests to the Permissions Department at John Wiley & Sons, Inc. The inclusion of contact information for permissions requests and a detailed list of trademarks underscores the legal protections surrounding this specific edition of the ‘Agentic AI For Dummies’ series. The document serves as a crucial legal disclaimer and a guide for understanding the rights and restrictions associated with the publication.
